161133.あと <%dL_NUM>個を納品すると\nさいほう部の 目標を 達成できるようだ:
If we deliver <%dL_NUM> more units, we'll be
able to meet the Ministry's goal...

161134.すでに さいほう部の課題の\n目標数には 到達済みです。:
We've already reached the target number for

161136.<pc>は 部活強化週間の\n課題成功ボーナスとして\n<%dL_BONUS_P:
<pc>  has earned <%dL_BONUS_POINT> P as a bonus for
completing his assignment during club
activities week!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

161137.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
A sewing method is the process of cutting and sewing together fabric to create a desired item... The cut fabric is wove together and
shaped to follow the success line... The quality of the finished product depends on the accuracy of this... It takes
concentration to execute a command... If you lose your concentration, you won't be able to do it, so pace yourself and choose your
commands. The more power you have, the more you'll be able to pull it off, but each time you pull it off, the power will change. The
more power you have, the more you'll be able to... If the game is interrupted by a communication error while you are playing,
you will lose your ticket...

161138.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nカットされた布を ぬいあわせて\n成:
Here's how to play it again! Wipe the cut pieces of cloth together and shape them to fit the success line... When all the squares
meet the success line, use the "finish" command to complete the game. The strength of the cloth changes each time it's sewn. The
strength of your wipe changes with each wipe, so keep an eye on your wiping power and the amount of concentration you have left to
achieve your goal!

161139.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほう部員であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
Sewing equipment... If you're a member of the
Saiho club, you can make items here...

161143.強化週間品となっている\nアイテムを 作りましょう！:
We're going to create an item that will
become an Enhanced Weekly Item!

161146.強化週間品となっている アイテムを\nできのよさ ★３（大成功）で しあげましょ:
You'll be able to get the best out of the
items that you've got in your collection.

161165.<color_yellow>\n学園内では 所属する部の設備を使って\n何度でも:
On campus, you can practice as often as you like using the facilities of your club... When you practice, you lose nothing if you
succeed or fail, so feel free to try it out... You can learn how to make items by clicking on the "Show description" command...
If you change the club you belong to, you can practice with other clubs' equipment... You can practice as much as you want and improve
your skills...

161166.練習で作った <%sL_RECIPE><color_yellow><%sL_QU: <%sL_RECIPE> made in practice<color_yellow><%sL_QUALITY><color_white>I've got a delivery for you...

161167.裁縫部が 活動を再開するまでは\nこの設備を使うことは できません。:
Until the sewing department is back in
action, we can't use this equipment...

161168.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:
You can now sew using materials found not only in the Animal Bag, but also in the Storage Area and Under the Roof! When you
select a recipe for which you don't have all the materials you need, you can use the materials items in the Storage Area and Under
the Roof...
